name: percept
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an idea of what something is like that you get from your senses: Pain is a complex percept. The eye providing the more stable percept is then, by definition, the dominant eye.
More examplesFewer examplesWe know only the existence of our sensations, percepts, and thoughts.The percept of that sandwich is the unfinished act of eating it.If I perceive a puddle on the sidewalk in front of me, the percept is a psychological act which is nearly defined.
